title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 41.5 - Temporarily uncertified shellfish lands
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 41.5 - Temporarily uncertified shellfish lands

State Regulations

The shellfish lands described in this section have not been
subject to complete examinations to determine the sanitary condition thereof
and are hereby designated as uncertified areas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
41.5

Amended, New

York State Register January 29, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 4, eff. 1/29/2014

Amended

New

York State Register December 4, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 49, eff. 12/4/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
